hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ubadah bin Samit said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) ruled that the fruit of a palm tree belongs to the one who pollinated it, and that the wealth of a slave belongs to the one who sold him, unless the purchaser stipulated a condition

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ بَاعَ نَخْلاً مُؤَبَّرًا أَوْ عَبْدًا لَهُ مَالٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Was Narrated Concerning One Who Sells A Pollinated Palm Tree Or A Slave Who Has Wea
